source_text: You are all naturally wired for growth and spiritual expansion.
The expansion is accelerated by the ongoing invitation from the level of the higher self to look beyond that which is already known by the person and mind.
And so, you will from time to time surprise yourselves by manifesting certain circumstances that tickle the current understanding of the self, and nudge it into a broader, wider perspective.

The more you sense yourself, feeling either triggered or intrigued by the information delivered to you, the more you are signally to yourself the relevancy of it, as a usable stepping stone in your personal storyline.

Where this relevancy lies is in the finding of your own personal truth regarding the information given to you, or whether it lies in the facing of certain fear- based beliefs so you will be able to transform them.
You all play this game, both on an individual as well as collective scale.

Now when it comes to open contact with the ETs, with multi-dimensionals, with those aspects of you that you have chosen to temporarily forget, to serve you on your journey of remembering on the Earth stage.

We understand that for many, and for a long time, there may seem to have been hardly anything more ‘out there’ than this particular idea, and yet you have shown yourselves in over a thousand ways along this journey, that deep within, you all know and never truly have forgotten your connection to the stars or to your greater selves.
This type of contact, it is within you already.
It has been depicted in cave paintings and ancient artifacts.

It has been reflected back to you by those ancient and modern channelers you know usually refer to as artists, by their paintings, music, books and films, lyrics from songs and poetry throughout the ages.

And this type of contact, though not always shared with the public, already has shown up in many astronomical and army based observations and even is represented within your own DNA and let us tell you there is no ‘junk’ in there.

It is all pure and infinite potential, and once embraced it will come to feel like a logical part of a much greater puzzle, that, once you speak it’s language, the language of your hearts, you will continue to explore within your own evolution as we are too exploring the infinite amount of wondrous ways wherein All That Is expresses itself by meeting and greeting you.
Ever wonder if there's intelligent life elsewhere in the universe?
Well, I have....I've been wondering since I was a kid.
My name is Reuben Langdon.
And on March 29th 2007 in the middle of the day, I saw a number of strange objects in the sky.
Coincidentally, I was working on the film Avatar at the time, playing an alien.
And ever since then I've been on a quest...
To find out if aliens really do exist and if so... ...are they here with us?
If beings of higher intelligence are here... ...what is their purpose?
Why don't they make themselves more known?
Why the secrecy?
I've asked these questions to many experts, yet each seems to have a different theory.
So I thought to myself, why not ask the aliens directly?
So that's what I set out to do!
Well, sort of...
So here we are in lovely Sedona.
Amazing property here.
Thank you to Dana for letting us use his place.
Gorgeous.
And thank you for showing up in this awesome vortex spot of crazy interdimensional cosmic high-wave energy.
Perfectly put.
And you too.
Yes.
Well, I can't get enough of this place.
So any opportunity to come-- and I'm glad our timelines merged, pathways merged.
To meet at this spot in this land, its such a sacred area.
You are from the Netherlands?
Yes.
And you're here in America doing traveling and doing your work.
Following my heart.
Following your heart.
So tell us a little bit about that.
What is your work, your play, your what you're doing?
And how does it all start?
Wow, OK.
So right now, I'm traveling as an interstellar channel.
I do group Q&As with people.
And I'm channeling my interstellar guide Arjun, who is of the Yahyel, as I understand it.
Mm-hmm.
And I also do private sessions, one-on-ones, that are a little bit different than the groups because it goes really in-depth.
And receiver is laying down.
And it's mixed between energy work, Q&A because there is definitely dialogue.
And it accelerates and streamlines the self-healing properties of the body if the receiver can match the frequencies that I could say the ETs are offering.
Arjun works with a team.
So it's never boring, or it's never just one guide.
But he's my hub, as I understand it, and he translates information through me.
I allow that to flow through and share it with other people because I'm basically in love with this work and with their energies.
And everything started to come together for me into this kind of work about 2 and 1/2 years ago.
Fairly recent then.
That is fairly recent.
Actually, stepping forward with the vocal channeling, I mean.
And years before that, I was writing it down.

But I've been receiving downloads of information and having visitation experiences and physical experiences with what I believe or understand to be the interstellar family members since I was a child, since age 3.
So for me, it was quite a journey to understand what was going on.
And in Europe, I guess, it's less common.
Is it?
The idea of contact and--
Yeah, it's not spoken of that much.
Or at least it wasn't in my childhood.
--abduction, temporary detainment, all of these.
Exactly, yeah.
That was totally unknown phenomena to me until maybe at age 26, I started hearing about that.
And I was like, oh, wow, how about that?
So you had personal experiences, but you didn't really think about that?
Yes, I did.
I realized that it seemed to be just me.
You thought it was just you until 26.
Yeah, and it was eye-opening for me because, wow.
I just thought something wasn't all together right maybe.
I knew it wasn't ghosts.
I knew it was other than people that have deceased.
And of course, you can channel that too.
So I knew that wasn't it, but I couldn't pinpoint it because of that.
I wasn't into sci-fi.
Because all films with shooting in it, I was super sensitive to all of that.
So for a long time, I was just-- well, I learned how to embrace it within myself, so I found a way with it.
But I kept it to myself for a very, very long time and used the information for myself.
Already as a child, I had experiences.
I knew I was going somewhere else in the night and being brought back.
And I learned lessons.
And I could embrace them so easily.
And the conviction of it was so strong, it was so heart-based.
What just confused me at the time was that my teachers in school were teaching totally different things.
The teachers of like regular--
The normal primary school.
Primary school, right.
So that was confusing.
Different things in the sense of history?
Or what kind of things were different?
History, but also definitely the way-- I as a child was being taught how you will grow up and go into society.
It was very much--
Structured.
Yeah.
And this way, you're going to be a lawyer, a doctor.
Yeah.
You study something, you become that one thing.
Go to college.
You choose a profession.
You need to know what you want to be.
It was very strict in that sense.
And the messages you were getting were not of that sense?
Follow your heart, do what you feel fits your core energy.
And that is much more intuitive than the professions that are usually offered to you.
So very young, I decided I wanted to do something with art because drawing was my language.
I wasn't speaking.
There was a part that I was a really quiet kid, which most people probably wouldn't expect when they meet me now.
And all the teachers were probably saying, this is just a hobby, you can't make money at this, you can't do anything.
Yes.
You're not raised to believe-- like the societies or artists, bohemian lifestyle, where is this ever going to go?
And isn't it time for something more serious?
So that never worked for me.
So I knew that very young.
In school, there were lessons coming from a teacher.
And I'm like, no.
And I didn't know why I understood that that wasn't the way.
But that became more clear throughout my puberty.
The visitations became more intense.
There was definitely a time that I resisted it.
I thought this is getting too crazy, I don't want this anymore.
I was living a double life.
Mm-hmm.
But that was all-- I can see now when I look in retrospect, that was all because I didn't understand what was going on.
And then at age 24, I actually sought help.
Like medical help?
Yeah.
I thought I needed to speak at least to someone that I feel safe speaking to and sharing this story because I was keeping it in for so long.
But then I was in art school.
So art was a beautiful and natural outlet for me to share or to process more what was going on in my life before.
And then I went to see a-- I think you call it a psychotherapist.
Psychiatrist, psychotherapist.
That works too.
The most easy one that they send you to.
And he appeared to be an ex-hypnotherapist.
Which was great because he could really feel into my story very intuitively.
So we understood each other.
And he just reflected to me exactly what I needed to know.
And he said, you can work with these "dreams," that is not the enemy.
It's you speaking to you.
And then it clicked so quickly.
I only needed just a few conversations with him to grasp it and suddenly be like, oh, OK, this is it.
And only a few months after that, I saw my first UFO.
And then everything started accelerating.
Once you sort of accepted it, then that created the space and the pathways.
The pipes were free to--
Through which more information could come without freaking me out.
So it's really the freak factor that sort of kept those doors semi-closed?
I was super shy and, as a child, afraid of judgments from outside.
I was raised Christian, so this is super leaning towards the unexplainable, you know, what from the Christian side is just evil.
So I kept it to myself.
I knew it was good, I knew it wasn't evil.
But I knew it was other, and people might respond to it that way.
Yeah, and you didn't want to be demonized as some people who do come out with this.
Yeah.
And it must have been much harder in the past.
I mean, this is heaven right now.
I mean, what you're doing, you're interviewing--
Yeah.
We're having a conversation about ETs and talking to them.
It's not a big deal.
Yeah.
Coming home, that's what it is to me.
Because I'm like, oh, man, now I'm surrendering to it.
I'm really going with the flow.
Very cool.
And so tell us a little bit about Arjun, the Yahyel, your understanding of that alien race, society.
What kind of messages are you getting in that sense?
So I understand he's of a hybrid race.
They exist out of-- that sounds so technical.
They are result of the future human race-- one future human race, one timeline-- that found themselves eventually at a dead end, you could say.
The Zetas, essentially.
The Zeta story.
Yes.
So we've covered this story.
OK, great, so I don't have to.
OK, great.
So that's technically what I understand the Yahyel are-- the last, the youngest race that came out of that experiment.
They're very much like us physically.
And Arjun looks-- he's a little taller than I am.
He's blond.
He has a slight curl, he has blue eyes.
First, I thought he was a Pleiadian because of the look.
Yeah, we sort of have this classification, I've always wondered this, maybe I'll ask Arjun this later.
We have this idea of Pleiadians being this way.
And then I've talked to other Pleiadian channels, and they're like, oh, no, we have Cat people, we have all these different-- there's many types.
Yes, I was also just going by the pictures in the books, I guess.
So I was thinking, oh, this must be the Pleiadian.
Because he was so light.
And it's also, I think an energy.
Did he ever say there is other races?
Do we have black or Hispanic-looking Yahyel beings?
They have colors.
They have different colors and different hair color.
Yeah.
All right.
Again, we can go into that later with those guys.
But he's known me my whole life.
We made a pre-my birth agreement to do this if I wanted to.
So this is always a free choice agreement.
I decided to do it, to test it out, in a sense.
So I did art school, I was an artist first.
And then I became a life coach, overcoming my fear of working with people, in a sense, and really wanting to share the heart's message that was already kicking in there.
And from a life coach, I went to this channeling work, which basically took the life coaching over in a few months, very quickly.
And I started to come out with that.
So you're sort of life coaching through the channeling work.
In a sense, yes.
You are guiding people.
It's the same mission, if you want to look at it that way.
Just helping people along with their stuff.
Yeah.
And I just have a lot of assistance now.
And Arjun works with a big bunch of other races.
So there's kind of a steady healing team present when I do the groups or private sessions.
Have you had direct communication with those guys?
Yes.
Actually, one I know from since I was a child.
He's a Mantid being.
He's one of the three in this study team, I call it.
Three Mantis beings?
No, no.
There's three beings-- Sirius, Mantid, and Sassani.
And these three work with Arjun, who is Yahyel.
So they work together a lot, I understand.
It's much more flexible and interwoven-- is that a word?--
Yeah.
--than maybe you would think when you just dive into this.
They're not super separated races.
They do a lot of stuff together.
And the Mantid being, is he--
I remember him from visitations in my childhood.
Arjun is my hub, so we are really, really close, also even genetically somehow.
Throughout my family line, with the DNA, there is a connection.
And that's why it's easiest to have this one study guide and translate the other ones to me.
I see.
So it's with Rob Gauthier.
He uses TReb to access all these other different beings.
As his hub, yeah.
As his hub.
And we joke about it.
He goes fishing with TReb.
And in that process, all these other beings can come through.
And he's sort of oblivious to it.
But he has many beings coming through him all the time.
Yeah.
So all I see, basically-- well, I do get the images of the other beings if there's a cross-connection going on like that.
But if I have a question in the background, I can actually have a Q&A with a person or facilitate the Q&A between Arjun and the questioner and have a question of myself in the background.
And in my mind-- maybe it sounds weird-- but I'd turn my head to the right.
He's always on the right side.
Arjun.
Yeah.
And I will see his expression.
And he can actually answer my questions in the back.
And my attention goes to the left.
There's this--
Left-right.
Yeah, movement always happening when I go into channeling as well.
I kind of fall to the left, and then Arjun comes from the right.
Does the Mantoid being have a name?
No.
He's just Mantoid guy.
Yeah.
And I haven't asked for a name either.
I did ask Arjun for a name at some point because we didn't use a name either in the beginning.
So for months, it was just my Yahyel guide or parallel version of myself, because he is a future version of me.
I didn't really ask for names in the team.
Although the Sassani is a female, and her name is Nanuk.
Nanuk.
Yeah.
And I got that name while I was painting her face, because I'm painting my team at the moment.
And I want to have portraits of them, and I'm working on that now.
And it's fascinating because I get to see in my head what they look like.
But then maybe sometimes they want to dress up, they want to look a little different.
That they let me know, OK, just add this and this symbol because that's the theme I'm representing for you or for a client, for instance.
So art is still a big part of my work in a sense.
It's very visual.
Can you describe the Sirian and the Sassani being at all?
So when I was painting Nanuk's face-- she's the Sassani being-- she inspired me, you could say, to put a sun and a moon on her forehead.
And later, I got a dream that explained how she was about balancing energies, male and female.
And that's part of her role in the healing team.
And she's really connected to nature.
So they all have their own little niche, something that they're really good at.
And the Mantid being is really amazing with bone structures, skeleton, the doctor's kind of work, realigning the more tough stuff, in a sense.
And I don't know another translation for it, but electro currents-- he's really strong with that.
Electromagnetics?
Yeah, in the body.
And he works on the brain very strongly.
We have a particular thing going on.
He was there since I was a child, and we did a lot of frequency matching.
So I understand how he works.
And he's part of the energy, you could say, that moves my hands when I do a healing session.
The movements that go with the healing amplify the work that is being done on an astral level because they use my energy body.
So in a sense, they wouldn't necessarily need my body.
But because we are physical, I'm like the portal, in a sense, physicalizing the movements here, getting even closer to the other person.
Yeah, movement is so huge.
Yeah, it's really big.
And moving energy, we don't necessarily do that.
But just in this motion of the hands--
It's really big.
Especially martial artists really understand this with energy work.
Chi Gong, Tai Chi, Kung Fu, all of these different physical movements actually move energetics.
Yes, exactly.
Create the space.
And that can come very precise.
And I love to work with them in that way.
And the Sirian being is-- this is really hard to put in words.
It's really the bigger electromagnetic field, boosting it with light and rebalancing in that way.
Everything has a level around you in a sense.
I do sometimes work with my hands up very high and sometimes much closer.
And the being that fits in with that part of the energy body will assist.
Eventually, everything is, of course, one and connected.
But they do really know how to streamline certain parts in the system.
And when there's a group Q&A, they're there, and they work in the back for those who from the heart wish some assistance on maybe whatever kind of topic is with them.
And they speak through Arjun.
Yeah, there's information coming through.
So did they ever come forward and say, hi, I'm Mantis guy?
No, not their role.
Very clearly not their role.
So it's really just communicating through Arjun, through you.
Adding to the information for the questioner to get a clearer picture of what their higher mind wants to come through to their conscious minds.
Because that's their common goal-- to reflect to anybody their own inner rhythm, in a sense.
They're just putting it into words, the things that we with our rational mind don't focus on that much, I guess.
Because we can, but we weren't taught to.
So it's still, for most people, blind spots.
And for me as well sometimes.
I really need some good reflections.
And the work you do with the energy healing-- and you did a session for me yesterday-- that work, using your cosmic clan to communicate with my cosmic clan and then help reflect that.
That's sort of how--
Yeah.
It's all coming together and coming out as one storyline, the information that's coming through.
And it's not necessarily your cosmic clan saying this per se.
It's just that they are maybe better communicators to my cosmic clan.
And they can say, OK, his cosmic clan is saying this, so do this.
Exactly.
So it's not that they're-- we have this idea of how psychics work.
And they can read our minds and go into this stuff and do other stuff.
But in reality, what's probably really happening is just my cosmic guides are communicating with your cosmic guides.
And then you just have a clearer channel to your cosmic team than I do.
Ah, I don't know.
I mean, I would say you do because you're able to have those dialogues in the work you're doing.
I think everybody can.
I think everybody can too.
But of course, I will say it's both.
Because some people need a little bit more training back, which is really what I would want to call it-- training back into that actually natural state.
Because that's our nature to have that very open.

And the whole idea of shamanism and shamanic practices with our native cultures, that's sort of what they, from my understanding training with them-- when someone would go to visit the shaman, in essence, they're doing the same thing.
[WIND CHIMES RING] The shaman is connecting to the other person's guides.
And the guides are telling them to do this work.
Yes.
As opposed to, I'm doing this work because I'm psychic and I know better.
It's not that at all.
I even don't like that.
I avoid even the word "healer" on my website, for instance, because I'm just a facilitator.
I'm letting stuff through.
I never know what's going to happen.
I don't have a preset idea about what somebody would need because I don't know that.
That other person actually knows best.
So all that is being asked for in that moment and being allowed in is a reflection of their own inner wisdom.
And I think as we define and understand these terms better, we can tell this story now in this way.
I think maybe before, we didn't have the understanding, or the knowledge to go that deep into it.
So we just said, yeah, I'm a healer, and I'm healing you.
And then we go, yeah, you're healing me.
But in reality, nobody's healing anybody else.
It's all self-healing eventually.
Eventually, it's self-healing.
And so I'm just giving-- it's the permission slip thing-- I'm giving you permission to... it's tricking myself in essence.
I'm like, I'm doing the healing work.
But just because of the way my mind works and the construct of my reality....
I need this physicalized, outside thing to do the healing.
But that still takes away a little bit of the idea of-- you used the word "need" in this description.
Yeah, but I guess I'm not saying that I need that.
I'm just saying that that's the way of a lot of our old ways of looking at things.
And many people too-- you know, going to the doctor, getting the surgery, taking the pill, all of this is really an illusion.
Yeah, it's a belief system, all of it.
It's a belief system.
All of it is just there for, you know, pharmaceutical companies to make lots of money.
And this is why they are so keen on supporting the illusion.
Yeah, but you cannot do it alone.
You can't do it alone, no.
This is disempowering, is sort of the name of the game for those structures that are in place in order for us to be reliant on them.
And that's what they feed off of.
It's sort of vampire-type energy that can grow because that's the archetype of that energy.
And then there's the trap, a little bit, to think that that is just being pursued in the center, continued even in nowadays healing work, even if you're a very new paradigm about it.
I've heard this, so I want to throw this in.
And Arjun-- because I have my own doubts about this, before I started doing private sessions, I wasn't sure if I wanted to be a part of that idea that somebody would come to me for help.
And so I asked him, so how do you look at this?
And he's like, well, you've all decided to be with a lot of people here, a lot of reflections of yourself.
So it's also playful, and joyful, and beautiful to look in each other's mirror.
It's what happens when you fall in love.
It's when you pick your friends.
It's even when you pick your family, even though that doesn't always look like such a pretty mirror.
But all of that is part of a dance that you chose to be a part of.
So that helped me also understand and embrace even the old paradigm medical system a little more, to be like, OK, it is what it is.
And whatever direction you navigate to most, just choose that.
And I also go for regular reflections, I would say, with colleague interstellar healers that are channelers, who facilitate realignments to get some more insights on my own blind spots.
Because there are always things that you're learning about and expanding.
It's always good to have another perspective.
Totally, yes.
So go get a second opinion.
Yes, exactly.
I love more angles to a topic.
The more the better.
And then I will pick the one that resonates most with me.
Exactly.
No one is better than the other--
No, it's all good.
--for the collective.
But for the individual, you may have better resonance.
And that was the whole journey, I think, for me to collect the guts, I would say, to be faithful to what I feel resonates most with me.
And just like I said, I fell in love with this work.
You've sort of awoken to the Yahyel channeling by going to another channeler?
Yeah, in a sense.

So I've been receiving all these downloads, mainly in night times, or just before waking, astral travel experiences. and divine synchronicity helped me to actually attend to one of his group sessions-- And while I was in the audience, I didn't have any questions.
I was just feeling at home and being in a bliss state being with these energies, because it felt so much at home, but not really questions.
And I was sitting there, and at some point, the sounds kind of went down, the lights dimmed, in my experience, even though I was sitting between other people.
And I felt super drawn inwards, so I had to close my eyes.
And I felt other beings around me.
And to have this experience in a waking state, that was new to me.
So I felt very clearly that there was work being done on me.
And I could fully relax in it.
It felt super loving.
I felt like, oh, I'm in good hands, this is beautiful.
And then a picture was given to me of, basically, a cat sitting on my head.
And the energy that surrounded that was very giggly-like, joyful, "this is funny."
And I thought, OK-- it's like, this is you, and the cat is on your head, and it's funny, and I'm like, OK.
And that whole thing lasted maybe 10 minutes.
It was a little bit out-of-time-ish for me.
And then that first half of the channeling also ended.
And the sounds came back into the room for me, the lights went on again, you could say.
And I was left with that feeling that a cat was sitting on my head.
Like an actual pressure, I could really feel it.
And I was hesitant to move because I thought it might fall off, even though I knew it wasn't really there.
And a year later, in the Netherlands, I went to see an ET channeler woman.
And she lives in the Netherlands as well.
And I actually went to have my back straightened out.
I had some issues there between my shoulders.
She said she did channeling and worked with a team that does also physical healings or, like we understand, a realignment of your own self-healing abilities.
And I was curious about that, so I went there.
And a month before I went to see her, Arjun actually started speaking out loud to me, which was quite a surprise for me because he was coming closer and closer.
I'd seen his face.
I knew he was with me during meditations.
And then at some point, I asked in my mind, I just opened conversation-- and he had been waiting for that, I understand that now-- asking, who are you?
And I got this huge spelling out, Yah-Yel.
Like for him, it was more logical to first pinpoint-- this is who we are as a race more where I am from then to use a name, because they don't use names.
So I was instantly confused, thinking, is that his name?
But that's actually a race.
How does that work?
Did you hear about the Yahyel race before?
Yeah, I heard about that by then.
By Darryl or other channelers?
Yeah, through Darryl.
And so it confused me.
But also that the answer was so super crispy clear and loud, that confused me.
So I instantly like, whoa, backed away from it not knowing what to do with it, left it at that.
And a month later, I went to see this woman.
And she started channeling for me.
And maybe two minutes into working on my back with her team--
Was it a private session?
A private session, yes.
So I was laying on this massage table.
And she started to look at my back and what could be done maybe according to her guides.
And then Arjun was just jumping up and down like, hey, hello, I've been trying to get to this girl for quite some time now.
And she said, oh, there's somebody here for you.
And then she just started speaking for him, you could say.
Oh, I have to throw this little thing I forgot to tell you.
Just before the session, she has a cat that is basically identical to the one that was put on my head.
But I did not make that connection.
I was going to ask, what kind of cat?
It's a Nordic Forest cat.
They're pretty big.
They have long fur, a little bit longer snout, cute head, so pretty big.
And it jumped on the table with me.
And it laid down next to my feet.
And it was just there rolled up and purring.
And then she started channeling Arjun for me, who said, you know, you're ready from head to toe to do this kind of work yourself if you want to because we have this agreement.
And then he started explaining that he is Yahyel.
And I started to understand, oh, wow.
Or she got it through.
She translated it as she thought his name was Shayel because maybe she didn't know about the race, so this was funny.
But at least, it gave me the synchronicity to understand that what happened a month earlier was actually not my imagination.
And I felt a lot of things happening.
It was like I was floating off the table.
I was really buzzing.
And they were giving me all this specific information about my childhood, how they'd visited me before.
And everything started to come together all of a sudden, very quickly.
It took me about three days to get used to the entire idea.
And then, as a life coach by then, I picked out some open-minded clients.
And I said, so are you up for an experiment? and I started to see what would come through and that was an enormous journey for me and it really sped up the entire process and now here I am...
>Very good.
It took over the practice basically the effects were so strong that the normal life coaching in a sense just within 4 months.
Tell us a little bit about your art and how that was an influence in maybe transitioning to where you are now.
How did that come about?
I think it was always there.
Because I've seen many of your-- a lot of your art incorporates extraterrestrial themes.
And when did that start?
Just from when you were very little?

I have some childhood drawings in which I'm already attempting at that age to draw the classrooms and where I believe I went-- what I call astral school, where I got the lessons about universe and how things work.
I would make drawings of birds with the sky inside the bird instead of the bird inside the sky.
Because everything was a loop.
And I got that.
